title: RIOT we need to spread information on illegal botting
body:
You need to erect awareness of the obviously ever-growing population of bots in peoples games.  Not everyone understands when there is a retarded bot in their game that feeds 1 death a minute on average. You need to spread awareness so these accounts can get banned so we can rid the community of the unnecessary anchors in unfortunate peoples games. 

I feel like I'm the only person doing something about it.

replies.body:
Hint: the biggest problems are as follows.

1. Their system clearly doesn't fucking work.
2. Their is no actual report function for these sorts of things.
Riot's system (duh?) that they introduced to combat deliberate feeders.

>Not everyone understands when there is a retarded bot in their game that feeds 1 death a minute on average.

This would be a deliberate feeding bot.
You obviously lack any knowledge that you think you have about said bots.
il copy this and post it lol
